ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup Peter Pan® Creamy Peanut Butter, divided
1 (9 inch) chocolate or graham cracker crumb crust
2 (0.73 ounce) envelopes Swiss Miss® Milk Chocolate Hot Cocoa Mix
2 ¼ cups vanilla ice cream, softened

cookingTips: Soften ice cream to spreadable consistency before layering for easier assembly
Dissolve cocoa mix completely in hot water for smooth chocolate sauce
Freeze assembled pie for at least 3 hours before serving for clean slices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user achieve proper layer consistency and understand how to soften ice cream without melting it completely.
